name: Thunder Hand
text: If a face-up monster(s) you control with 1600 original ATK or original DEF is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY (if it was there when the monster was destroyed) or hand (even if not), and if you do, destroy 1 card your opponent controls. If Summoned this way, banish this card when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Thunder Hand" once per turn.
